channel.title: What private server tools do you want?
channel.description:
I'm thinking of making a website with some random private server tools, like:
[ul][li]IP Finder[/li] [li]Port Forwarding Checker[/li] [li]Extended Private Server Source Download List[/li] [li]Status List[/li] [li]Advertising Section (been a while since MITB's had one)[/li] [li]Spawn Lists[/li][/ul]
What else would you like to see from a site like this? Post here, and I'll use any ideas I think are good. Thanks a lot.
Ideas from other people:
[ul][li]Command Helper[/li][/ul]

Please delete one message?

item.title: What private server tools do you want?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

If you need any help with backend programming [php etc] I can help you there if you need it, pm me. (I have actual knowledge of it).

Also, for a suggestion, a tutorial section type thing? Not like forums, but rather where user-submitted content or tutorials you made and only some are accepted [ie the useful ones, not crap] , and theres links to them, which can be broken into sections, for like server, client, or whatever.

Read full topic
item.source: What private server tools do you want?

item.title: What private server tools do you want?
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

Hey, Aftermath, will you add my Server Tool? I will send you a pm with a tutorial on how to get it started.

Main reason you should add this:
It’s an all in one tool; compiler, server runner/restarter. That eliminates any need of batch files and black screen (consoles, it has a built in one that will not open in a new window) so all you will need is one JAR file and you are good to go. I’m still working on new features also… Suggestions will be welcome.

This compiler will work with any JDK version from 6u1 to 6u9, this is mine:

Trying JDK version 1.6u9 The system cannot find the path specified. JDK version 1.6u9 failed, trying JDK version 1.6u8 The system cannot find the path specified. JDK version 1.6u8 failed, trying JDK version 1.6u7 The system cannot find the path specified. JDK version 1.6u7 failed, trying JDK version 1.6u6 Note: ServerTool.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.

I have 6u6.

Read full topic

~I Lured I~[/quote]

what about how to make a server video too? and btw good luck mate i hope u do a good job … well better than bitch silabsoft
